title: Ninja Bugei-cho aka Band of Ninja 1967 DVDRip Sonata Premiere
description:
A surprising contribution by Oshima to animation cinema taking a popular manga by Sampei Shirato to the screen. An experimental work depicting a completely different way of understanding animated film. In 16th Century Japan, Jutaro Yuki has to escape with the men faithful to him when his father is murdered by Shuzen Sakagami. Years later, Jutaro returns to the castle to take his revenge on the traitor, but Hotarubi, the latterâ€™s sister, prevents him twice from doing so, although he comes back to power due to a revolt caused by lack of food in the fields.


Subs srt: Portuguese / English / Spanish
